name: Christmas Snatcher
description:
Christmas Snatcher is a 2D Puzzle Platformer in which you play as Francesca "Frannie" Claus and you help her steal all the presents and bring them to goal under a timer.

Keyboard Controls

A&D/Left and Right Arrow - Moving

Space Bar - Jump

W/Up arrow - Drop presents in Goal (The tree)

Y key/P Key - Take presents from Goal

Shift - Dash

G Key/I Key - Action Button (Roll at the first two bag sizes, Slam at the heaviest size)

F Key/O Key - Throw Present

R Key - shortcut for restarting level

And escape is pause

Controller Controls
Left Joystick/Dpad - Move

Bottom Face Button - Jump

Up Joystick/DPad Up - Drop presents in Goal

Top Face Button - Take presents from goal

Left Face Button - Dash

Shoulder Buttons - Action Button

Right Face Button - Throw presents

Select Button - Restart level shortcut

Start Button - Pause

Tips and Tricks - Only look here if you're struggling!

The slam can be used to break crates. They break in several hits. It can also be used to stun the elves!

You can jump cancel out of the roll, but be careful not to overshoot your landing!
